name: Sunset Land Demo
description:
Sunset Land is a metroidvania about using your ever increasing psychic abilities to blast enemies and navigate difficult platforming challenges. 

The game takes place on Venture, a planet that has recently been colonized by several corporations to harvest its valuable resources. You play as a psychic named Marco, who is tasked with stealing 3 stellar crystals (artifacts which contain tremendous amounts of energy) for an intergalactic mob boss. 

The demo lets you explore the first area of the game, complete with the first town, dungeon, and a couple of optional power-ups to find. Hope you enjoy and let me know what you think. I'd love to get some feedback.

This download is a ROM that you can play on an NES emulator. The game uses flash saving (for saving your progress) but not all emulators support it. I'd recommend using the latest version of Mesen or FCEU to play it.
